example.text: Tumours with breakpoints just 5 to exon 1, or distant from c-myc, have normal c-myc mRNAs of 2.25 and 2.4 kb, which differ at their 5 ends, while tumours with breakpoints within exon 1 or intron 1 alter c-myc mRNAs (2.1-2.7 kb in Burkitt lines), being initiated within intron 1.
